title: Romain Bardet Says Goodbye to the Tour de France: ‘I’m Pushing My Best Numbers Just to Finish Top 20’
content:
Team DSM's French figurehead ‘at peace’ with his career and reflects on how pro cycling has changed ahead of planned retirement in June 2025.

Read the full article at Romain Bardet Says Goodbye to the Tour de France: ‘I’m Pushing My Best Numbers Just to Finish Top 20’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
